statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, encrypted_password FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE username LIKE '%user%' AND id > 5;
SELECT id, encrypted_password FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 8 AND username IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data WHERE username = 'admin' AND encrypted_password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, name FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, id, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, LENGTH(encrypted_data) AS data_length FROM sensitive_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 8;
SELECT name, encrypted_data, key_id FROM sensitive_data JOIN encryption_keys ON sensitive_data.id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE '%Alice%' AND encrypted_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_id, encrypted_data FROM encrypted_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE data_id IN (SELECT id FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 3);
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data INNER JOIN encrypted_data ON sensitive_data.id = encrypted_data.data_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key = (SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT id, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id LEFT JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';

SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 2
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY access_time ASC
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND role = 'admin'
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name ILIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY id ASC
